info.title: API Gateway GenSDK Test API
info.description: API for testing generated SDKs. See w?AWS/Mobile/Backplane/lyue_intern_project for more info

get.summary: GET a list of simple model

post.summary: post a list of simple model

responseTemplates.application/json: {"stringproperty": "foo", "intproperty": 2147483647, "longintproperty": 2147483650, "floatproperty": 1.2, "doubleproperty": 3.1415926535, "boolproperty": false, "nestedobject1": {"nestedobject2": {"asdf":18}}, "asimplemodel": {"name": "constantinople", id: 1453}, "arrayofint": [1,2,3,4,5], "arrayofsimplemodel": [{"name": "agincourt", id: 1415 }, {"name": "rubicon", id: -49}, {"name": "carthage", id" -149}], "alistofsimplemodel": [{"name": "agincourt", id: 1415 }, {"name": "rubicon", id: -49}, {"name": "carthage", id" -149}], "2darray": [[1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]]}

post.description: NOTE: the request header mapping for Content-Type is in case when browsers send application/json; charset=UTF-8 instead
